thread.title: Form: Application to register as a British citizen: form UKF

title: Form: Application to register as a British citizen: form UKF
text:
11 October 2016, see all updates Form to register as a British citizen by a person born before 1 July 2006 to a British father and whose parents were not married. Documents PDF , 342KB , 22 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. PDF , 236KB , 20 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. Details 
Use this form to apply to register as a British citizen by a person born before 1 July 2006 to a British father and whose parents were not married. 
See the guidance notes for more information on who can use this form. Document information
